channel.title: Jacquie Feuerborn on c13u's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Jacquie Feuerborn on c13u's Blog

item.title: Modeling Social Influence on Facebook
item.description: Some Research Questions How can we measure influential power of individuals on FB or Twitter? Analysis problem: #friends? #followers? #retweets? Data mining: FB’s friendship topology How can we use the knowledge of influential power’s distribution to actually influence people online? Synthesis problem: FB recommending friends; marketing campaigns seeding influential people How can we quantify statistical properties of opinions on FB or Twitter? Sentiment analysis: political leaning, opinions about products Use to predict, e.
